document_name: Revised version Project Document KHDR 2010 and 2011.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The primary objective of the report is the provision of a high quality piece of research which stimulates public discussion and improves policymaking in the fields of Private Sector and Employment. Yet the overall aims are wider than merely producing a report, and include offering a practical resource to policymakers; and building the capacity of national researchers, through exposure to analysis of an international standard.

project_descr: The primary objective of the Kosovo Humane Development Report Project on Social Inclusion is the provision of a high quality research which stimulates public discussion and improves policymaking.
